scripts.package-index: ncc build index.js && mv dist/index.js dist/index-temp.js
scripts.package-npm: ncc build npm.js && mv dist/index.js dist/npm.js
scripts.package-github: ncc build github.js && mv dist/index.js dist/github.js && mv dist/index-temp.js dist/index.js
scripts.commit-package: git add dist/* && git commit -m "chore: Packaging" || true
scripts.release: npm run package-index && npm run package-npm && npm run package-github && npm run commit-package && standard-version
